benchmark_details.name: Jawaher
benchmark_details.overview: Jawaher is a benchmark designed to assess LLMsâ€™ capacity to comprehend and interpret Arabic proverbs and includes 10,037 proverbs from various Arabic dialects.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To facilitate the development and evaluation of models capable of translating and explaining figurative language, specifically Arabic proverbs.

data.source: Publicly available online resources, manually curated by native speakers.
data.annotation: Manually curated and dual-annotated by experts.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on token similarity using contextual embeddings.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in translation and explanation tasks.
methodology.validation: Evaluated through comprehensive experiments on open- and closed-source models.
